website_summaries.verdict: Designed for hardwood floors but can be used on virtually any hard flooring in the home.
pros: Perfect for hardwood floors, and it comes with Bona hardwood floor cleaner
Microfiber pad is reusable and machine washable
Designed with a hook that saves storage room
Bona's water-based solution is safe for pets, kids, and the planet
cons: Bona uses its own cleaning product and mop isn't recommended for use with different cleaning products

website_summaries.verdict: One of the best known cleaning solutions and mops – for good reason.
pros: Initial Bona premium package comes with a refillable cartridge, along with the reusable Bona microfiber cleaning pad
New 2018 design makes it easier to use and store
Durable mop includes a spray trigger so you can use both hands to push mop – no need to spray solution as you walk
Beloved by those with  bamboo floors, which are tricky to clean and maintain
Amazing customer service should something go wrong
Pads can be washed and reused
cons: Some say they’ve had problems with the solution leaking out during storage

customer_reviews.title: Same as $11 Walmart mop.
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with this at all. The cleaner left streaks on my floor. And the mop itself is a pretty simple design. I bought the one on the right from Walmart for $11. It does the exact same thing and is made the same way, except you can flip the pad over and use both sides. Bought the bona because it had great reviews and I am having trouble finding something compatible with our laminate floors. This is was NOT the answer.
customer_reviews.author: Muzikluver

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS ... customer service WORSE
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about using this product and I immediately did as soon as ot arrived. It cleaned bt the floor did not shine but that was ok. The next day i see that the entire bottle of fluid had leaked.. I put some water in it and that leaked again. Now I cant use this product .The worst is the customer service.I tried multiple times and nobody comes on the call and so i was forced to write this review.
customer_reviews.author: gudcustomer

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS CLEANING SOLUTION
customer_reviews.text: If it wasnt for the Bona spray mop leaking the whole bottle of cleaning solution on my floor...I'd give it a 5☆ But it LEAKS! I emailed the company and they quickly sent me a new one. The new one LEAKS TOO!! I have not delt with Bona about the replacement leaking. I'm going to do that very soon. Unless they fix the leaking problem I would suggest NOT BUYING the Bona UNTIL THE PROBLEM IS SOLVED!
customer_reviews.author: Shrainier

customer_reviews.title: Beats swiffer hands down.
customer_reviews.text: We have tile, hardwood and laminate throughout our new home. I've been using the swiffer wet pads to clean our floors. I'd easily use 8 to 10 pads every time I mopped. I hated the impact to the environment, not to mention the cost. I did some research and found the Bona mop to be highly rated. I just mopped my floors and they look fantastic! Didn't realize the swiffer was leaving such a residue. Also it didn't take as long due to the size of the mop.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K

customer_reviews.title: Much improved over previous Bona Spray Mop!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an original Bona Spray Mop a few years ago and like everyone else's it stopped spraying. In fact it leaked all over my closet and stained the hardwoods. But I still had three brand new cartridges and some new mop heads so I ordered the new version, thinking I could use up what I had at least. Big surprise! The New version is awesome! It's much more substantial and is really easy to use. I've only had it a few months, but so far I am very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: SapphireNana

customer_reviews.title: Must have for the OCD cleaners...
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop. Like other reviews so simple. No batteries and no need to buy extra pads. The floor looks and feels amazing. Other products would leave a sticky feeling on the floor. Your floor feels and looks clean. At first I thought the pad was a little too large and would not fit around my furniture. Not so..works perfectly under and around everything. So glad I purchased. The best part you can wash the pad!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rogerscoyote

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made product
customer_reviews.text: This mop began having trouble after about a month. The spray would stop working after six “shots” and I’d have to adjust the tank by hand. Now after just over six months the button that releases the tank to refill it has jammed rendering the entire thing useless trash. The actually cleaning fluid is great but use a different mop. I will be switching to an O-Cedar spray mop to use the Bona Liquid
customer_reviews.author: mittens

customer_reviews.title: Normally love these..NOT THIS ONE!!
customer_reviews.text: I normally love the Bona Spray Mops. However, I ordered this one, put it together, left it to use the next day and when I got ready to use it, all the liquid had leaked out and was all over the floor. Not a drop was left in the container. Also this is the mop that the container is not suppose to cave in..not so!! Very dissappointed. Will return
customer_reviews.author: Frank--NC

customer_reviews.title: Best Mop Ever for the price
customer_reviews.text: I Love This Item, Well worth the money. We have laminate floors through out our whole house and did not leave any streaks behind and dried quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Love this mop!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many different types of mops & cleaners on my hardwood floors and was not happy with any of them and would end up throwing them away. It was back to scrubbing the floors on my hands & knees. I saw this mop & thought I would give it a try. WOW was I surprised & happy with the results. I love it. I’m so disappointed that I hadn’t found it sooner. It makes cleaning sooo much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa h.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: BROKE IN LESS THAN 90- DAYS!! NO OPTION TO RETURN
customer_reviews.author: NM Burch Dental

customer_reviews.title: Great time saver!
customer_reviews.text: The Bona Hardwood Floor Spray Mop is an excellent tool! Having the spray bottle attached to the mop is a big time saver. The spray goes a good distance and covers a wide area. Even so, not that much of the liquid is used each time. It was a pleasant surprise that it came full of liquid! The only small negative is that it is a little heavy -- while still being maneuverable. But I figure that is just a little more exercise which can't be bad!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Mount

customer_reviews.title: I really like this spray mop.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this spray mop. I use this every day. The cleaner is good I think it works better than other cleaners I have used. I also bought the Bona refill cleaner. Good purchase, I would recommend UPDATE: It's now 1/19/19 and my mop is still as good as I bought it. I have refilled it several times with the Bona cleaner and no problems. I bought extra pads too. I put the pads in the washer to clean with no fabric softener and let air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Product leaked entire bottle out on floor!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! Put it together yesterday afternoon, luckily I set it in the restroom while I fixed lunch for the kids, when I came back the entire bottle leaked out! My bathroom floor was soaked! I cleaned everything up, then put the bottle back on I thought maybe I did something wrong? But then I saw the leak start right away... I took the picture and took the liquid out again... I was really looking forward to using this product... very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyM09

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Buy
customer_reviews.text: I got this because we just put in new hardwood floors. I have used it three times and I will be throwing it away. The first time I used it, it was great. The second time I used it the sprayer didn’t work very well and the liquid solution leaked out of the spray opening on the front of the handlebase a little. The third time I used it, the stayer didn’t work at all and ALL of the liquid solution came pouring out of the spray opening on the front of the handlebase. I am very unhappy with this product and will not be buying products from this maker in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Jochum

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mop! Has made cleaning so much easier!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great mop! I am a tall person and the handle is longer than how most mops come, so I really appreciate this since I generally mop at the end of my cleaning regiment. I also like the fact that I generally only have to do one pass and my floors are clean! Plus the floors dry quickly. Clean up is so easy- detach cleaning solution and remove pad then toss in washing machine to clean and I am done! Excellent on my ceramic tiles in bathroom and laminate floor in kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: MISTINE N SHAW

customer_reviews.title: Does not spray
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this premium mop and Bona container because it was recommended by several people with floors similar to mine. Unfortunately, about half a minute into the first use, the spray stopped working, leaving me with a bottle of Bona and a cloth mophead cover that can be attached to other mops with the same shape, but at I could have bought for much less money. The mechanical part of the purchase is useless. I should have asked for a refund within the return window but was busy as well as annoyed and did not want to deal with finding a box in which to send the defective product back.
customer_reviews.author: Public name

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is s great product. The spray mist is wide as is the mophead. It's light weight with a refillable cartridge which is both convenient and cost effective. I like being able to wash and reuse the heads rather than continuously buying disposable replacement. I purchased an extra pack of the multiple tyes of heads ( duster,etc) I like it very much. My aunt is getting one for her place too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this hardwood floor cleaner/mop. Claims to NOT leave streaks or a film. WRONG!!!!! My hardwood floors are covered in film, as you can see in the photo, and where I rubbed it off with my fingers. Do not buy, makes your job harder
customer_reviews.author: valerie psomas

customer_reviews.title: ~ Excellent Spray Mop!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my daughter's new waterproof laminate floor. She really likes using it. She said it's mop head is nice and wide, covering a lot of area. The cleaning solution is great too. No streaks or clouding. She's very happy with this spray mop.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Mc

customer_reviews.title: Love the Clean but a bit of a workout
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically because I have huge laminate floors and the pad is wider than the usual microfiber mops, and our building recommends Bona. It wasn't easy to snap together [had to get stronger guy to do it] and when you put it down the snap-in-bottle is very heavy and while the sprayer is wonderful for a nice area, it's difficult to push...more difficult than a vacuum--and I have back issues. So it works well for what it does but a lighter bottle would be better and would help it push more easily....but the clean is great, no problems there. Glad I bought it, but need a nap after "floor day".
customer_reviews.author: HappyWheeler

customer_reviews.title: New Design Features Make This Mop an A+
customer_reviews.text: I had the previous version of this mop. The design and features were not thought out well. The new Premium mop has a nicer handle which is flat on the end and has a bit of silicone on it. This means that it lays nicely against the wall, if you put the mop aside for a few minutes. The previous mop had a round handle which never stayed put against the wall. It would always fall to the floor. The slot that holds the fluid container is designed well, not spillage and it clicks into place with ease. Good Job, Bona!
customer_reviews.author: SciFiGirl007

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of leaks...
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to find something so easy to put together and use, however, I used it once, and a few days later, my husband found it empty with a puddle around it. The entire cartridge emptied into the closet we store it in. No instructions on storing the mop or how to refill a cartridge. Something isnt right since I also got a mop for my tile floors, and it doesnt leak....yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Niklaus

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I just received my new mop and its defective. The metal pole will not lock into the bottom plastic part. The clip looks broken. When you squeeze the spray handle, the metal handle pops out. I will exchange it and give it one more try.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Tellado

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I have used my mop twice and it's already broken. Won't spray out the cleaner. I
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Great update
customer_reviews.text: I have used Bona products on my floor for more than 10 years and have always been happy with the results. However, I absolutely HATED the spray bottle and the swivel mop that always seemed to go in the direction I didn't want it to go! Thank you, Bona, for finally giving me a system that works!
customer_reviews.author: Shelbyz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I almost had my hardwood floors refinished, bug then a neighbor told me about this apparatus. Saved $XXXX.XX
customer_reviews.author: NASA GEMINI TEAM

customer_reviews.title: Newly Refinished Hardwood
customer_reviews.text: My hardwood floors were just refinished. There's still a lot of renovating going on in my house and the dust is accumulating, no matter what doors are closed and plastic is hanging up. Sweeping didn't work to eliminate the dust. Using a floor duster did not completely get the dust up and it got filled up very quickly (even though it was an OXO). I tried the Bona hardwood floor mop with the attachable cleaner. It was awesome. Cleaned up everything. The larger pad is great. Simple. My only issue was it was a bit difficult to get the pieces together because they didn't just snap into place so easily. But the cleaning was fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: R. Berg

customer_reviews.title: This makes mopping easier!
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of floor cleaning with the Bona spray mop. I dislike how easily the microcloth comes loose on the corners while mopping.
customer_reviews.author: mtn meadows

customer_reviews.title: It cleans my dark wood kitchen floor
customer_reviews.text: This mop with the new solution cleans my dark wood kitchen floor like nothing else. I am thrilled. I've had this dark floor where everything even water drops show and it's been a nightmare to clean. I finally upgraded to this new mop. I had the original one which was very light and had a different solution that seemed to spread the grease around and never totally clean it. I am a happy camper. This one is heavier to manipulate but totally does the trick. Money well invested.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne C.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I do not generally leave negative reviews but for the money spent this product is absolutely worthless. The release button for the refillable container broke within a month and now the sprayer won’t work. The Bona cleaner is also questionable. There was a spot on my brand new LVP flooring that would not come clean. Went over it with the bona several times over the course of several weeks. Every time the floor dried, the spot was there. Finally cleaned it with plain hot water and it is gone Too late to return but would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: Easy to remove fluid bottle to refill!
customer_reviews.text: This new generation mop is ok. I noticed when moving back and forth, liquid squirts out. Also, with the longer mop head and pads, the corner portions of the pad are not able to be held in place as the velcro strips are shorter. Also, the mop head will flip over sometimes when going back and forth. The best thing about this mop is how easy it is to remove the cleaner fluid cartridge and the longer mop head.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Riddled with problems
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Bona. I had to replace the first because the trigger didn’t work. Now this one leaks everywhere, so i have to refill it and it makes a complete mess of my floor. I am so over this. I want to be environmentally conscious but this is just absurd - going back to swiffer which i has exclusively good experiences with
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth St Louis

customer_reviews.title: Too fragile!
customer_reviews.text: It works well, BUT this is the 3rd one in 6 months. If the bottom parts gets bumped - even slightly - from the handle, the “connection” is broken. The product line is broken and won’t spray. The 1st one broke less than one month after purchase and Amazon replaced. The 2nd one lasted 3-4 months and the same thing. But, it does clean up quickly and easily - hope 3rd time is the charm otherwise it’s the wet strips.
customer_reviews.author: Gwyn Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Much improved!
customer_reviews.text: The previous mop system Bona had was cheap, and not well put together and I ended up Purchasing a few that stopped working after a while prior to this. It was extremely difficult to use and after they get to be about two months old, they were almost impossible to use, by that point. I’m so glad they made this new one because it actually appears up-to-date and feels sturdy in your hand while you’re using it. The mop solution squirts out easily and evenly and the mop moves around easily, which indicates that it is of a better quality than the previous one. I’m so happy they made a new one!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan F

customer_reviews.title: NO GOOD STOPPED WORKING
customer_reviews.text: Right after the return expiration date the Bona stopped straying. We went online for a video to tell us how to correct this issue - the said to take it apart which was almost impossible to do once you have assembled it. We managed to do it and reassemble but that did not correct the issue. Bona does not stand behind this issue because its a poplular defect in the mop. So guess we are out our $30 for the Bona Mop. Live and learn. Bona is just no good.
customer_reviews.author: Mamabee

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dirty
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived late even tho I have prime feels cheap and it arrived used and dirty returning this poorly made product
customer_reviews.author: Heydi

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great
customer_reviews.text: First time I tried this product. It is great. Cleans my laminate flooring; leaves no residue and the floors shiny without having to put on another product to make them shine. Love the mop. Will be buying another cover so I have an extra
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hardwood floors or tile and laminate
customer_reviews.text: We just had our hardwood floors sanded, stained and refinished. Our contractor recommended that we use this on the floors as he warned that too much water sitting on the floor after mopping could cause the finish to wear prematurely over time. Model was easy to assemble and refills are available for the cleaner receptical. Pad can be easily thrown in to the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Webster

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the original mop.
customer_reviews.text: I had the original Bona mop for my hardwood floors. It stopped spraying a couple of years after I got it. After using a spray bottle and mop I decided to try this newer Bona mop. What a difference! It is larger and much more sturdy. I hope the spray mechanism doesn't break down. So far, so good. The only problem I've had with it is that the velcro strip that holds the mop pad started to come off when I removed the pad. Be careful to take off the pad slowly. You might have to hold the black strip on the mop in place while removing the pad.
customer_reviews.author: Low Bow

customer_reviews.title: If you have hardwod floors, you NEED this mop system!!
customer_reviews.text: When we installed all new top grade hardwood flooring in our home, I did a lot of research into floor care. This product kept coming up as top of the line in my searches. So, I took the chance and purchased the kit. I am thrilled with the quality and the way our floors look. I use the mop regularly and the wood comes clean with no residue, dulling of shine, or stickiness. This truly IS a fantastic mop and cleaning system for hardwood floors!
customer_reviews.author: Gold City Mercantile

customer_reviews.title: Leaves hard to remove film on the floor.
customer_reviews.text: After 2 uses on my real hardwood floors I noticed a film on the floor. Will not use this product any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian E.

customer_reviews.title: Cut my hand, ruined my floors, impossible to return
customer_reviews.text: I cannot be more frustrated and disappointed. Not only did the mop spray mechanism break immediately, but the cleaner it came with made my floors so sticky and impossible to re-clean after use, but it’s literally IMPOSSIBLE TO BREAKDOWN TO RETURN. What the hell. Once you click it together you can never get it back down into a box that UPS will take. I had to literally unscrew hidden pieces, stab at it with a screw driver, and ended up stabbing through my hand (user error but still so annoyed... could have been avoided if it was able to dissemble). I have no idea how I’m going to return this broken POS.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Kistler

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for hardwood floor
customer_reviews.text: I finally broke down and bought this for the hardwood floors. I am very happy that I did. It was easy to put together and is even easiest to use. It works amazingly well in the floors. I would highly recommend his for you hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: MEL

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This a bad joke as it doesn’t clean as it claims it does on my laminate. My Wet Jet cleaning mop works 10 X better and was much cheaper n the replacement cleaning fluid and pads. A real disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: stinger-1

customer_reviews.title: Spray trigger breaks easy
customer_reviews.text: We had one of these before and the spray trigger broke and the one we bought on 6/15/18 the spray trigger has also broke.
customer_reviews.author: Tawannah Burris

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This thing doesn't spray ANYTHING. It sprayed once and then nothing came out after that. Made sure that is was all attached correctly. Terrible product
customer_reviews.author: Brick

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but would NOT buy again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in March 2020. It is now mid-June 2020 and it is broken. I bet I've bought five of these things. I love the ease of use and the fact that you can wash the floor cleaner and can refill the dispenser with water and vinegar, but this is ridiculous. This is the worst one yet. Not only can I not get the water dispenser out to refill it, but this time the spray nozzle doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Dee S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: It was defective and the Bona company sent out a new one.
customer_reviews.text: The handle did not stay connected to the bottom part of the unit; it kept pulling out. I got in touch with the Bona company and they sent out an entirely new spray mop. This one works and does a great job. Also, the gal recommended that I wet the microfiber pad before starting to clean the floors. Great tip and made the pad move more easily over the floors.
customer_reviews.author: NIPS

customer_reviews.title: Can't Remove the Container to Refill
customer_reviews.text: Badly designed. I filled it once, maybe twice, since purchasing. I defy anyone to successfully depress the button to remove the cartridge for refilling. I tossed it today. Wanted to throw it into the trash, but it won't fit. Not worth paying for a special trash pick-up. Clearly defective. Once filled, works fine, but otherwise NO. It's tossed into a corner of my basement.
customer_reviews.author: Reader in Upstate NY

customer_reviews.title: Love that it's a natural alternative! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop! I wanted something that was natural because other spray mops made my cat sick. I also like that there's less waste since you just throw it in the wash. The grip on the handle really helps to control it and the trigger is easy to spray with. It feels sturdy. It's easy to use and wash the mop cloth. I store the cleaner container off the mop because it does leak like others said. But it's easy to put on and take off and comes with a cap to seal. I'm almost out and will be buying more cleaner solution as well as extra mop cloths.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Convenience
customer_reviews.text: I hope that this review gets printed. First up - I love this mop. It's easy to use, convenient, and does a great job. However, when I first went to assemble the mop, one of the attachments was broken. I spoke to Amazon, and was sent a new mop almost immediately. GREAT!!! Amazon told me to throw away the broken mop, and I thought the case was closed. Then I get an email asking why I didn't return the broken mop, and that I was going to be charged for two mops. Several phone calls later, I was told that the problem was resolved. I hope so....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product- better than swifter but one I received was used.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and it works well with Bona disposable dusting cloths but the one I recieved was used! Scuff marks on rubberized corners, and plastic body. Assembled unit and tested out trigger sprayer before inserting liquid cartridge and liquid came out of sprayer onto my couch! Leads me to believe there was liquid left in mechanism before it was returned. I don’t like reading reviews on company faults overpowering quality or performance of product itself. Make no mistake this is an awesome product and far outperforms the swifter line. I am only disappointed that I recieved a used item.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Not what it seems to be
customer_reviews.text: Thought I liked this mop but no more. After using it for 2 months the black Velcro strips to hold the mop pad on started coming off with the pads. I’d stick them back on over and over. Then I Gorilla glided the strips on and poof. 2 uses later the strips are off again. Wish I could find a way to get word to manufacture. So mad and sad.
customer_reviews.author: g@montana

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mop to use on brand new LVT and laminate flooring. Pros: The mop itself is very easy to use, it's nice and wide to cover a lot of floor all at once, the microfiber cloth is machine washable and easy to take off/put on, the solution doesn't have a strong odor and dries quickly. Cons: Doesn't seem to get the floors as clean as a steam mop (which can't be used on this floor type) or traditional mop and bucket, and the solution appears to leave a haze on the floor. Overall, the mop is really nice, but I'm not 100% sold on the cleaning solution that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize that you couldn’t use fabric softener on microfiber for washing the pads, so that part is my fault and I did have to buy new pads because of that. Very easy to use, I do feel as though sometimes it doesn’t always seem to get things actually clean and seems to just be doing surface wiping. But, I do like it and it’s all I use on my laminate floors!
customer_reviews.author: Dina Mikule

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED - wow, awesome CX....8mo and nearly done
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: having had a poor performing product and writing below review, we reached out directly to Bona customer service. Received a response w/in hours, and resolved the issue to our satisfaction. Unit works perfectly - kudos to the Bona CX (customer experience) team. 5 stars. We have had this for about 8 mo now, prob used it less than 12 times, worked fantastic in the beginning, but now the spray has gone from a perfect directed mist to blobs or nothing at all, Tried cleaning with warm water - no change. Not very happy this thing does not last...
customer_reviews.author: kATHERINE L MILLER

customer_reviews.title: Bona Mop
customer_reviews.text: My kitchen, dining room, utility room and one bathroom have laminate wood floors. I love this mop and the Bona cleaner that you use with it. It is so easy to use, moves into all corners, and makes the floor look great. After mopping with a rag mop and a bucket of soapy water, you will really appreciate this one!
customer_reviews.author: Gram44boys

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm SO happy with this new floor mop. I've tried Swifer and other mops with no success until this one. I highly recommend this product; well built, easy to use and awesome results too. Comes with a good supply of floor cleaner which does such a great job. Yeah!! Clean floors at last without too much effort. Came the next day. :- )
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Savarese

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous luster
customer_reviews.text: We re-did our woo floors about 45 days ago, dark stain. The contractor said to let it "cure" for a month before using any cleaner, and he recommended Bona. When our cleaning lady arrived, she told us that Bona was what she always uses on wood floors. I was out when she did the work, but when I returned, I was amazed at the high glossy finish the floors had - even nicer than when installed. Since then, I've used the unit myself for some spot cleaning, and it's very easy to use. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: G. Simms

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive Velcro pull off on first try.
customer_reviews.text: I usually like bona products but the first time I used this, when I went to pull off the boba pad, the adhesive Velcro came off with it. So now I’ll have to either glue it or buy more adhesive Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Gmahle

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in half opened box
customer_reviews.text: The box my Bona came in arrived half opened. There was no tape on the box what so ever. There was no packing slep, directions on how to assemble or warranty info. in the box. So not sure if it should have included these items? I figured out to put it all together myself and used it once. Seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handle came apart first use
customer_reviews.text: There are many things I like about this mop, but the handle came apart and the plastic snapped off (that holds it in) the first time I used it. I made sure I followed all the directions on how to put it together, yet it still does not work properly. I had to industrial tape it so I could finish the job. I should have believed all the poor reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Carpp

customer_reviews.title: Great product for wood floors and lazy bachelors.
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastically . Only reason i give it less then 5 is the first one broke pretty quickly. Hope this one last longer. But for a lazy bachelor like myself it beats any bucket/mop combo or the ones where you keep buying those slippery things you put on the bottom (swifter)?
customer_reviews.author: ari silvasti

customer_reviews.title: Happy mopper to flopper...
customer_reviews.text: The first few times I used this mop on my travertine tile floors I was in love!!!! I was replacing my Clorox ready mop that broke twice causing problems. With another surgery in July, I knew I needed a reliable new, easy, lightweight but efficient mop. I couldn’t believe how easy it was to use! Unfortunately after a few weeks of mopping, the refillable solution bottle stopped fitting into the mop correctly. Causing me to now have to manually push the bottle into place before each spray. With a back pain, this is frustrating and such a hassle. It also now squeaks, is very loose & floppy with little control. I need a lightweight mop I can rely on.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay W

customer_reviews.title: The Best Product for Hardwood Floors
customer_reviews.text: This was a wonderful product that was easy to put onto my hardwood floors, and they look great. I was hesitant at first because I had a area of hardwood floors that was hardly used but had not been conditioned (other than mopping) in three years. I was so pleased with the results, I purchased the same product made for tile floors as well!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M Tello

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this is to use, it does a good general clean but I found I still had to clean harder stains on my hands & knees. It took me awhile to put together the lower part of the handle with the spray did not just easily click into the base like the instructions said it would. I haven’t had a mop in about 7 years as I’m a hands and knees floor cleaner usually, this was a nice change!
customer_reviews.author: kali

customer_reviews.title: Best one I've found
customer_reviews.text: I tried some other brands, Swiffer comes to mind, but this one is a lot better. Bigger surface coverage, soft edge bumpers, and the Bona floor cleaner is probably the best out there. Vac, or "swiffer" dry before you use this product, and you'll get better results. YouTube has a comparison between Bona and Swiffer. Swiffer leaves a slight hazy residue, Bona does not. The handle is sturdy aluminum with a soft sleeve for your hand, not a cheap plastic handle that will break in time.
customer_reviews.author: George W

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the reviews. Not a good product. The spray is inconsistent and there is no control so you end up spraying your walls and baseboards. When I attempted to take it apart to return to amazon it broke and is now garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Drew Arp

customer_reviews.title: Mixed results with this spray mop
customer_reviews.text: I like the wide mop head and the easy maneuverability to this mop. I like that the mop pad is easy to remove and wash. I don't like the sprayer. It barely spritzes so is leaves streaks. And even when I wasn't actively using the spray it would still spritz a little bit and if I didn't notice and mop over the area immediately it would leave drip marks. Today I removed the spray bottle and transferred the contents to a hand held sprayer. It worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Prdsepop2

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleaning with Bona Hardwood Spray Mop Premium
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for a number of years now on my hardwood floors. My other one started leaking so I had to get a new one, which I did. The new one is a much better design. I do like it because you can refill the canister instead of buying a new one. The only thing I'm not crazy about is the "spray"...It doesn't seem to give an even spray like the old one did. I'll have to examine it further, perhaps one of the holes was clogged.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Schmid

customer_reviews.title: That's a yes from me
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement buy, since someone in my house broke my other. The prices pretty spot on even compared to Walmart. However, I chose to buy from Amazon because they had other choices for pads and cleaner that Walmart does not. I have all laminate wood flooring upstairs and this stuff kicks dirt and grime to the curb. A lot of people think it's a lot of money but it's totally worth it especially for quick spill clean ups and heavy duty. I have even made my own cleaner with my essential oils. Very much worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: M Lees

customer_reviews.title: Worked great while it worked...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in February and it stopped working in July. Don’t waste your money. Update: I contacted Bona customer service yesterday, and a new mop was shipped out to me TODAY. This is unbeatable customer service, and I won’t hesitate to buy Bona products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: 2tattered

customer_reviews.title: Used it twice....and stopped spaying!
customer_reviews.text: Will get a replacement and will see if it lasts longer than 2 weeks! If not will look for another
customer_reviews.author: Carole  A.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 uses
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in May 2020 and used it four times total before the base and that attaches to the handle broke. I was not doing anything out of the ordinary with it. Just using it to mop my tile floors. Pretty disappointed given the amount of money I spent on this. Also, the "cleaner" that comes with it and sprays out leaves a film. I felt like it didn't really clean, just left a glossy "fake clean" look on my floors. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Muncal

customer_reviews.title: DONE, DONE, DONE WITH THIS THING!
customer_reviews.text: I hate this thing! Purchased this after the one that came with my new hardwood floors broke off at the swivel, in short order. Just finished mopping the floors and have finally had it with having to stop frequently and pull out and then put back the bottle to clear an apparent air lock. And then we’re good for about 10 sprays. Seriously, it would be easier to us the low tech mop and carry around a spray bottle. So done with this!
customer_reviews.author: NPC

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this mop!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 of these in 2020. One from Amazon and one from Target. Both were too late to rI wasted money pn both mops. eturn. The refillable container gets stick in the mop and we tried very hard to remove it. I bought the 2nd thinking it was just a lemon. Nope, the design is terrible and I wasted money buying 2. The BONA solution is awesome, the mop is poorly designed and I DO NOT recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Zisler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mop
customer_reviews.text: This mop is high quality, easy, easy easy to use..I have arthritic hands so it took my husband to help me put it together-- it wasn't difficult it's just that you need strong hands. This is my only suggestion for improvement--to think about user issues when you design products. I used it for the first time today and wow! It swivels so you can easily get under and around furniture. Hoping it holds up BUT it seems pretty solid. I never thought I would be writing a review about a mop BUT this is just too wonderful not to..kudos to the designers...
customer_reviews.author: GRT

customer_reviews.title: Love the mop, hate the leaking spray bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I have had several Bona mops in the last several years for our homes. The older version of the Bona mop had an issue with the spray bottle sucking in and collapsing, therefore holding very little cleaner in it. The newer version has a much harder exterior to the spray bottle, but now I am having issues with all the cleaning liquid running out of the bottle. I have loved the mop, but it has been a continuous problem with the spray bottle. Would like to see this completely resolved before Bona loses many customers over this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Grisard

customer_reviews.title: Great for vinyl plank floors
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my new home with vinyl plank floors and couldn’t be happier. Be sure to get the cleaner for laminate floors for vynl, not the one for hardwood that probably shows as being frequently bought with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas C.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until it broke :(
customer_reviews.text: Great mop for our new home with 80% hardwood floors. Large surface makes for quick time mopping... disposable pads work great as well. By the 4th or 5th use the handle started spinning inside the plastic base... renders the trigger useless when not fully lined up. We have it taped up because we still need to use it, I was hoping it was a fluke, but other reviews seem to talk about this issue too :( Great mop otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: James Hart

customer_reviews.title: BAD BAD
customer_reviews.text: Stopped spraying within the first month, in order to spray I have to physically push down the cartridge so it can spray few times and repeat. Also, today it broke at the base, that really pissed me off. I rarely write reviews, but this is insane. I am outside of my return window and have a useless piece of J and $40 in the trash! I’ve used this mop maybe 25-30 times Unacceptable. Please don’t buy, save yourself a headache and frustration. I wish I had listened
customer_reviews.author: morelight

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy, didn't fit under sofa.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this mop as it was too heavy and cumbersome to use. It's easier for me to use my microfiber pad mop and a spray bottle filled with floor cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Beachgirl

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. It broke the first time I used it. Got 1 room done and half of another. I use a wheelchair and thought this mop would work great for me. Worked great until the mop snapped off of the handle. Should replace the plastic with metal parts.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Good house tool
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and it is easy to use however the container that holds the cleaning solution does this funny thing where I need to let air in it because it won't spray after a while. So I need to pull it apart but are in the container. Other than that it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: lavinia

customer_reviews.title: seems nice and simple
customer_reviews.text: I have vinyl floors so can't rate for wood. This thing is not a vacuum and has no suction - dumb to ask for that rating. Was pretty easy to assemble and operate tho it takes some muscle to push over our new Luxury Vinyl Plank floor. The flooring maker recommended this product and the cleaner. I'll have to see how it does over time - but it feels like it scrubs well and sprays well ahead of the mop head.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie W. Dunaway

customer_reviews.title: Much better then other systems.
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these for hardwood floors in the past and it kept my floors clean, streak free and shinning. Now I have laminate floors so got the appropriate set up and love it still. It takes a bit more effort to use then a wet swiffer but it doesn’t leave the residue so floors stay nice longer and look better. I love being able to throw the pad in the washer too.
customer_reviews.author: lindase

customer_reviews.title: worked fine the first time
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that would be easy on my back and good for quick clean ups. This worked fine the first time I used it but has been nothing but a fight with it to get it to work since then. I can't really say that it does a great job cleaning; it will get spots off the floor but you can't really tell that it's done much to actually clean. But the mop pad part does wash well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Randall

customer_reviews.title: Came broken and Amazon won’t refund
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible! I assembled this item and as soon as I did it started leaking from the bottom. I called Amazon they were slow to respond, and finally after almost an hour, they told me they couldn’t because the handle doesn’t detach from the bottom. Which means I can’t send it in the same box as it came in. So they said they couldn’t return my mop I bought and I’m stuck with a defective one. Poor service, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Little Baby Momma

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Bona Mop. I only use these mops to spot clean so they only get occasional use. The first one broke so I thought I would give it one more shot in case it was a one off but the second one is now broken after maybe six or seven uses. The button will not release the cartridge no matter what. I would skip this product and look at alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: A 5 star winner!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this moo! I’ve tried so many different types of moos. Either they’re too cumbersome or too flimsy and they break. I feel like Goldilocks because THIS mop is JUST RIGHT! Delightfully sturdy, easy to use and the best part? The bottle of cleaner it comes with is refillable. That was an unexpected perk! Well done BONA. This mop is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for new home
customer_reviews.text: We built a new home and as expected, after "builder cleaning", we still had a small amount of sheet-rock dust on the engineered hardwood floors. This thing rocks!! I can't attest to the durability because we have only used it twice, but it appears to be a quality tool.
customer_reviews.author: davidp

customer_reviews.title: Good product but bulky
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mop to replace my old Bono mop because it was leaking whenever not in use. Apparently there is a "commerical" and a the normal size mop. This mop is longer, heavier and the pad is wider which is inconvenient for the size of my house. Same great product but too tall and heavy for me as I'm 5'4" makes it awkward. Also, the old mop had a metal tab for hanging the mop. The new mop has a plastic tab. Wonder how long that will last?
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Dale

customer_reviews.title: Buy the new spray refill mop.
customer_reviews.text: Use all Bona products now. Replaced the old ones that had problems with refill bottles collapsing when sprayed. Put it off far to long because it is expensive. Although no more so than any of the other brands and generic brands out today. Finally did it and I am so glad. Even though I used the spray and their mop it just still isn’t as east as grabbing one thing when companies coming.
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Makes mopping so much easier
customer_reviews.text: I had been using just the plain mop and spray bottle and I have a LOT of wood floors. I was a little concerned after reading some reviews, but luckily I got one that works well. I love just spraying as I go and not having to carry around a separate bottle. I still use the manual one for under the bed and couch as the sprayer won't work right in it's in that folded down position. It's not particularly light weight, but I'm hoping that's because it's sturdy. I'm glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I hate this thing
customer_reviews.text: I hate this thing. I have not been able to “just click into place” the reservoir. I bought it to make some housekeeping easier but it’s a nightmare. The reservoir keeps popping out of the mop. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: saintly

customer_reviews.title: Refill option pointless
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this mop for a while second time around. Had to buy the new version because I had worn out the last one out. The mop works great for cleans on my hard woods...My grip about the new one is the refill cartridge. It has a baggie inside so it is preventing me from refilling the cartridge with the large refill concentrate. The baggie collapses and the liquid doesn’t go in, it just overflows out. Extremely frustrating and makes the refill option pointless.
customer_reviews.author: dperk

customer_reviews.title: Best Cleaning Product I Have Ever Bought
customer_reviews.text: It saves me so much time. All the floors in my house are laminate, except the kitchen, laundry room and our 2 bathrooms which are tiled. I used the clean them the same way I do with Bona, a floor swiffer type pole; but I had to have a spray bottle for the cleaning product and the pole. So I would spray the floor, put down the spray, grab the cleaning pole, Swift the floor and then repeat... this product come the the spray bottle attached, and a much larger surface cleaner cloth. So much better! So much time saved!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Super effective and great value
customer_reviews.text: I needed a simple, effective mop that is safe for my hardwood floors. This has exceeded those expectations. I used to use swiffers but hated using the pads and always felt like it was a workout to mop the floors well with it. This is so easy to use, the spray is so smooth, and I love that I can choose what solution to use in the tank! A great value.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS MOP!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop so much. I never knew I could love a mop, but there it is. It works with the laminate/tile/stone (green) cleaner cartridges as well as the hardwood floor (blue) ones (found that out after I purchased it for my hardwood floors). Works with the new refillable cartridges as well as the old throw away ones. Don’t hesitate at all!!!! Buy this thing!!!! Well worth whatever crazy price amazon may jack it up to be.
customer_reviews.author: nchottie

product_meta.title: Bona Hardwood Floor Premium Spray Mop
product_meta.description: Style:Hardwood FloorThe next-generation Bona Premium Spray Mop for Hardwood Floors is an all-in-one solution to clean and reveal the natural shine of your floors. Includes Bona's waterbased residue-free cleaner in a refillable cartridge and a washable microfiber pad. The original formula cleans hardwood floors effectively by removing dust, dirt and grime revealing beautiful floors. The extra-large mop head delivers quick and effective cleaning, and the flexible rubber corners protect baseboards and furniture from dings and scratches. A secondary grip allows for added cleaning power, and a retractable hook makes storage easy.
feature_bullets: Safe for all unwaxed, unoiled, polyurethane finished wood floors
Extra-large mop head cleans 40% faster than the leading competitor
Comes with full-size 34oz ready-to-use Original Formula Bona Hardwood Floor Cleaner
Easily refillable cartridge and machine washable microfiber cleaning pad included
Durable and lightweight design with secondary grip, flexible rubber corners, and a retractable hook for easy storage
